mapper.insert:
insert into tunesurge_users.ts_user(username, password, salt, wx_unionid, nickname, user_avatar, user_back, sex, email, cell_phone, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.salt}, #{entity.wxUnionid}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.userAvatar}, #{entity.userBack}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.cellPhone}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into tunesurge_users.ts_user(username, password, salt, wx_unionid, nickname, user_avatar, user_back, sex, email, cell_phone, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.salt}, #{entity.wxUnionid}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.userAvatar}, #{entity.userBack}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.cellPhone}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update username = values(username) , password = values(password) , salt = values(salt) , wx_unionid = values(wx_unionid) , nickname = values(nickname) , user_avatar = values(user_avatar) , user_back = values(user_back) , sex = values(sex) , email = values(email) , cell_phone = values(cell_phone) , status = values(status) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
